1044320.name: Human Pinball : Iceage Demo
1044320.description:
Immersive-Games brings you

Human Pinball : Iceage

 the demo

ReRelease: Some signage has been added within the game, to aid locating the Sphere Deposits to begin the action. A larger Infrared screen as been added and improvements to the Jumpsuit torchlight for better navigation. The demo version now has more time allotted so you can explore the scenes in greater detail.

This demo is a time limited version of the full game. Please use this to test if your system can run the game, before you purchase the full game.
(tip: you can also survey the surface to find the first objective and familiarise yourself with the controls)

The demo and the full game have been created to support 32+64bit architecture.

Recover the precious spheres, transport them using the abandoned robotic tram lines where possible, place each sphere into its receptor. Once this is complete, a recovery beacon will be sent to the waiting teams. Discover your escape portal.

How far will you get to create a personal best time?
